nodes.text: This unidentified planet housed Bannistar Station, an Imperial refueling station. The station's refineries were placed on the planet's surface, the rest of the station was located high above. During the Attack on Bannistar Station much of the station was destroyed and at least one Star Destroyer crashed on the planet.
This planet was explored sometime between 3000 BBY and 1000 BBY.
By 25 ABY, This planet boasted a population of 10 million to 100 million sentients.
